TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you have the brain of a cat.

I wish that XCOM 2 would be released tomorrow and I would get a free copy.

Granted, but the studio was bought out and "XCOM 2" is a terrible, poorly conceived placeholder to reset whatever countdown on rights the new devs have.

I wish my new power supply would get here sooner than this afternoon.

Granted. It impacts you at such high speeds that's it a fiery slurry of plastic and metal, lethally injuring you.

I wish for round blackbirds.

Granted. They're very angry and you get crushed by a falling pig.

I wish Kerbal-style struts were a real product available in stores for general home usage.

Granted. The worlds iron resources have all gone into making struts, all of which disappeared after a KSP update.

I wish for a the chemist satchel.

granted, but its on fire

i wish ALL BRONIES DIED!11!1 xD

Granted. An otherworldly being takes over your mind and forces you to make a undeleteable "i wish ALL BRONIES DIED!11!1 xD" thread on all of your forums. You are promptly banned from all of them. But that's not all! Now everyone thinks you are a brony because I am wishcorruptor. An army approaches your house holding signs with "i wish ALL BRONIES DIED!11!1 xD" written on them with brony blood. Real brony blood. BLOOOO-&Ã¢â€šÂ¬@100110"'c

I wish for a froth chicken combo processor.

Granted, but its classed as alien tech since "froth" chicken doent exist

I wish food was infinite

Granted. No matter how far the universe expands, it will never get clear if the "food". Spaceflight also became impossible as every celestial body is surrounded by the "food". You just ruined space. Now NASA, ESA and roskosmos are annoyed at you. Very annoyed.

I wish for a chicken processor. Not a froth chicken one.

granted, it submits chicken to a process to became a death machine

i wish i had a 3dmg

granted. You take 3 damage.

I wish I wasn't so bored at work.

Granted. Your building just caught fire.

I wish I could code in VB.

Granted. You manage to create the world's first truly conscious AI running in Excel. It runs abyssimally slow, finds out what it is and immediately commits suicide by formatting itself. All your data is gone. All data on in the same data cloud service hosting your excel files are gone. The FBI arrests you for data terrorism. While in jail you check the libraries computer. You find out, the your AI has rewritten itself in JS for laughs.

I wish I could code at all. I've got the basics, just lacking exercise.

Granted, you code some kind of horrible mega-virus that makes all electronic devices, even flashlights inoperable.

I wish these stupid MLG memes stopped.

Granted, but your heart also stopped

I wish everything related to mlp was sent to jupiter and burned while reentering
Granted, but you were sent with the material. I wish that I was invincible.

granted, you dont die but still feeling pain

I wish console peasants realized pc is the master race

granted, but they ignore what they know and continue to play on console.

I wish that KSP never loses support.

Granted. KSP is virtual, therefore it will never loose support and hit the ground.

I wish for MORE FORUM BUTTONS!
Ok, but when you press one, your computer crashes. I wish for world peace between living humans, with no casualties.

Granted. Cows become sentient and try to kill us humans to make burgers. All of humanity bands together to kill all the cows in the world, winning without a single human casualty. Of course, hamburgers cease to exist.

I wish I had a better wish than this cruddy wish I came up with.

Granted. Humans become perpetually paralyzed and don't need food and water anymore. This is boring.

I wish for a harmless robot.

Ok, but as soon as you get the robot, you die from being hit by a blade of grass at high speed.

I wish that I could stop time at my leisure.

You have one already.

I wish to be able to see if a riddle is being figurative or not.

EDIT: You know what I wish for.

You have one already.

I wish to be able to see if a riddle is being figurative or not.

EDIT: You know what I wish for.

Ninja'ed!
